pages.title: Introduction to JSON-SCADA
pages.purpose: Provide a comprehensive introduction to the JSON-SCADA platform, explaining its purpose as a SCADA/IIoT system, core philosophy, and target use cases

pages.title: Key Features and Capabilities
pages.purpose: Detail the main features including protocol support, horizontal scalability, multi-platform deployment, visualization capabilities, and security features

pages.title: System Requirements
pages.purpose: Document hardware and software requirements for different deployment scenarios (Windows, Linux, Docker) including minimum and recommended specifications

pages.title: System Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the overall system architecture including the layered design, microservices approach, and how components interact

pages.title: Data Flow Architecture
pages.purpose: Document how data flows through the system from protocol drivers through processing layers to storage and visualization

pages.title: Database Schema
pages.purpose: Detail the MongoDB collections (realtimeData, commandsQueue, soeData, etc.) and PostgreSQL/TimescaleDB tables with field definitions and relationships

pages.title: Security Model
pages.purpose: Explain authentication mechanisms (JWT, LDAP), role-based access control, API security, and protocol-level security (TLS)

pages.title: Redundancy and High Availability
pages.purpose: Document the redundancy control mechanism for protocol drivers and data processors, including active/standby failover

pages.title: Installation and Deployment
pages.purpose: Overview of deployment options and general installation workflow

pages.title: Windows Installation
pages.purpose: Step-by-step guide for Windows installation using the NSIS installer, including service management with NSSM and embedded runtime components

pages.title: Linux Installation
pages.purpose: Installation guide for RHEL 9 and Ubuntu 24.04 using installation scripts, systemd configuration, and Supervisor process management

pages.title: Docker Deployment
pages.purpose: Guide for deploying JSON-SCADA using Docker Compose, including demo environment setup and production considerations

pages.title: One-Way Replication Setup
pages.purpose: Configure mongofw and mongowr services for one-way MongoDB replication between JSON-SCADA instances

pages.title: Core Components
pages.purpose: Overview of the core application components and their responsibilities

pages.title: Realtime Server and Authentication
pages.purpose: Document the server_realtime_auth service including opcApi, GraphQL API, WebSocket connections, JWT authentication, and LDAP integration

pages.title: Data Processors
pages.purpose: Explain cs_data_processor (change stream processing, value conversion, alarm detection), calculations engine, and cs_custom_processor

pages.title: Alarm System
pages.purpose: Detail alarm and event generation, SOE (Sequence of Events), acknowledgment workflow, beep mechanism, and priority handling

pages.title: Historian and Data Retention
pages.purpose: Document PostgreSQL/TimescaleDB integration, historical data archival, dead-band logic, and retention policies

pages.title: Protocol Drivers
pages.purpose: Overview of the protocol driver architecture, driver lifecycle, and configuration model

pages.title: IEC 60870-5-104 Client/Server
pages.purpose: Document IEC 104 protocol driver including client/server modes, link addressing, ASDU types, command execution, and configuration parameters

pages.title: OPC-UA Client/Server
pages.purpose: Comprehensive guide to OPC-UA driver including auto-tag creation, namespace browsing, subscription management, certificate handling, and command execution

pages.title: DNP3 Client/Server
pages.purpose: Document DNP3 protocol driver including client/server modes, class scans, unsolicited responses, TLS security, and address mapping

pages.title: MQTT-Sparkplug Driver

pages.purpose: Cover PLC4X (Modbus, S7, Allen-Bradley), IEC 61850, PLCTags, and IEC 60870-5-101 drivers

pages.title: Telegraf Integration
pages.purpose: Explain Telegraf metrics collection, UDP listener, and integration with system monitoring

pages.title: Other Protocol Drivers
pages.purpose: Document additional drivers including ONVIF cameras, OPC-DA client, and i104m monitor

pages.title: User Interfaces
pages.purpose: Overview of the web-based user interfaces and visualization tools

pages.title: Web HMI Interface
pages.purpose: Document the HMI viewers (Display, Events, Tabular, Alarms, Trend, Curves) and their functionality

pages.title: Admin UI
pages.purpose: Detail the Vue.js AdminUI including configuration management, authentication, theme customization, and multi-language support

pages.title: Grafana Integration
pages.purpose: Configure Grafana dashboards, data sources, embedded mode, and authentication proxy integration
